ingredients.ingredient: 8 leaves basil, or more to taste
1 Â½ pounds barramundi (Asian sea bass) fillets

cookingTips: Pat fish dry before wrapping to ensure prosciutto adheres and sears properly
Place basil between prosciutto and fish to prevent it from burning during cooking
Sear skin-side down first to crisp the prosciutto, then flip gently to cook through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand how wrapping delicate fish protects it while cooking and how prosciutto contributes fat and flavor that prevents dryness.
